page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: The land around Salford Priors and Harvington is mainly used for farming. One of the biggest farms in Salford Priors is Rushford farm which has 700 acres of land. The present farmer is Mr.B.Banting who has been at the farm for 30 years. Mr.Banting's main crop is winter wheat but he also grows winter barley, spring barley, oilseed rape, cattle beans and grass_seeds. His main problem is weeds like cleavers but uses herbicides to control them, but, like all farmers, has other problems. One of the problems is weather, but no_one can control that. Mr.Banting has some livestock. He has 80 beef cattle & 20 horses. He has a new combine harvester as well as tractors, a plough, cultivator etc. to help in his work.
